result.execSummary:
The defendant Russell E Kontaxis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Causing Mental Harm to Child, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.04(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample.  Undergo any counseling/treatment and evaluation per agent.  Sex offender treatment.  Sex offender registry under 301.45(b) for period of probation or minimum period of statute.

If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

timeConds.notes:
Commence on or before May 8, 2015
Consecutive to: to any other sentence/commitment

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Russell E Kontaxis in court with attorney Daniel M. Berkos.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State has receive PSI.  Atty. Berkos and DE have received PSI.  State gives recommendation and concurs w/PSI recommendation  Atty. Berkos gives recommendation.  DE does allocution. Court withholds sentence.

Count 1:
5 years Probation
4 mos. SCJ, w/work release.  No good time.  Commence on or before May 8, 2015 @ 7 pm
EMP per jail rules and agent
DNA surcharge $250/sample
Undergo any counseling, evaluation, treatment per agent.
Sex Offender Treatment
Sex Offender Registry under 301.45(b) for period of probation or minimum period of statute
AODA & treatment
$268.00 C/C  & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Paperwork handed in court.
Sentencing hearing on March 9, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Sentencing hearing on March 9, 2015 at 10:30 pm.

Defendant Russell E Kontaxis in court with attorney Daniel M. Berkos.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states agreement.  PSI to be requested w/plea/sent to be heard in Br 2.  Date already received from Br 2.  Parties will stipulate to minimum of 5 years probation and no prison recommendations.  Atty Berkos agrees w/statement by State.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/binds over.  Atty Berkos acknowledges rec. information/waives reading and enters NC plea.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  PSI ordered and to be completed by 2/23/2015.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 10:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on December 12, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Russell E Kontaxis in court with attorney Daniel M. Berkos.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Berkos states matter isn't resolved.  Requests reset to review discovery/videotape.  Requests prelim.  Time limits cont'd waived.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 12, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Pre-trial conference on October 24, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Return date on November 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Russell E Kontaxis in court with attorney Daniel M. Berkos.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense waives reading of complaint.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  Requests PTC and RD.  State requests signature bond.  $5,000.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Booking today and no contact KMB (dob 9/26/2000).  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 24, 2014 at 09:30 am.  Return date scheduled for November 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
